hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="HAAS-ova-hpjdwpd" /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init start /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init fixup /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'wget http://esb.metacentrum.cz/haas.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' ###################
/puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh metalib/tests/phase2.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpjdwpd.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpjdwpd/tests/hpjdwpd.sh' ###################
/puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh jenkins/bin/haas_vm_cleanup.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init shutdown /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init export "/data/builds/HAAS-hpjdwpd.ova" /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init destroy
/puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init import "/data/builds/HAAS-hpjdwpd.ova" /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init start /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh jenkins/bin/haas_vm_finalize.sh -w "$(/puppet/metalib/bin/avahi.findservice.sh _warden-server._tcp)" -s SECRET -t TOKEN' /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpjdwpd/tests/hpjdwpd.sh'
